title: Deep elf elementalist
data:

*For a list of all deep elves, see [list of deep elves](/List_of_deep_elves "List of deep elves").*

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| - | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | The primal forces of the universe dance at this demented wizard's fingertips. They are renowned for the ability to dig out and pin down even the most elusive foes with powerful, unavoidable magic. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Deep elf elementalists** are elven casters who cast a variety of elemental spells. They appear in the [Elven Halls](/Elven_Halls "Elven Halls").

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                                                                                 |                                                     |
| :---------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Lee's Rapid Deconstruction](/Lee%27s_Rapid_Deconstruction "Lee's Rapid Deconstruction") (3d20) | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot2       | [Fireball](/Fireball "Fireball") (3d23)                                                         | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot3       | [Freezing Cloud](/Freezing_Cloud "Freezing Cloud") (2d24)                                       | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot4       | [Repel Missiles](/Repel_Missiles "Repel Missiles")                                              | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot5       | [Haste](/Haste "Haste")                                                                         | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- Lee's Rapid Deconstruction can be painful to lightly armoured characters. If you aren't made out of stone, you can avoid this spell by standing away from walls. If you have low AC, corridor fighting becomes less viable whenever an elementalist shows up.
- [Gargoyles](/Gargoyle "Gargoyle") and players in [Statue Form](/Statue_Form "Statue Form") are vulnerable to LRD, and should be especially wary of elementalists.

## History

- In [0.32](/0.32 "0.32"), deep elf elementalists will cast [Hoarfrost Cannonade](/Hoarfrost_Cannonade "Hoarfrost Cannonade") instead of [Freezing Cloud](/Freezing_Cloud "Freezing Cloud").
- Prior to [0.31](/0.31 "0.31"), deep elf elementalists could cast [Awaken Earth](/Awaken_Earth "Awaken Earth"), a spell that broke rock [walls](/Wall "Wall") and summoned [earth elementals](/Earth_elemental "Earth elemental"), instead of Lee's Rapid Deconstruction.
- Prior to [0.18](/0.18 "0.18"), they could cast [Iron Shot](/Iron_Shot "Iron Shot"), [Summon Air Elementals](/Summon_Air_Elementals "Summon Air Elementals"), [Sticky Flame Range](/Sticky_Flame#Sticky_Flame_Range "Sticky Flame"), [Summon Water Elementals](/Summon_Water_Elementals "Summon Water Elementals"), and [Blink](/Blink "Blink").
html:
Deep elf elementalist

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

For a list of all deep elves, see list of deep elves.

deep elf elementalist e 
HP 41-84
HD 14
XP 1560
Speed 10
AC 1
EV 12
Will 120
Attack1 12 (hit: plain)


Resistances None
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Weapons & armour
Starting equipment
Open doors
Holiness Natural
Size Medium
Type elf, elf
Flags See invisible
Speaks
Warm-blooded
The primal forces of the universe dance at this demented wizard's fingertips. They are renowned for the ability to dig out and pin down even the most elusive foes with powerful, unavoidable magic.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

Deep elf elementalists are elven casters who cast a variety of elemental spells. They appear in the Elven Halls.

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Lee's Rapid Deconstruction (3d20) Wizard flag
Slot2 Fireball (3d23) Wizard flag
Slot3 Freezing Cloud (2d24) Wizard flag
Slot4 Repel Missiles Wizard flag
Slot5 Haste Wizard flag

Tips & Tricks

  • Lee's Rapid Deconstruction can be painful to lightly armoured characters. If you aren't made out of stone, you can avoid this spell by standing away from walls. If you have low AC, corridor fighting becomes less viable whenever an elementalist shows up.
  • Gargoyles and players in Statue Form are vulnerable to LRD, and should be especially wary of elementalists.

History

  • In 0.32, deep elf elementalists will cast Hoarfrost Cannonade instead of Freezing Cloud.
  • Prior to 0.31, deep elf elementalists could cast Awaken Earth, a spell that broke rock walls and summoned earth elementals, instead of Lee's Rapid Deconstruction.
  • Prior to 0.18, they could cast Iron Shot, Summon Air Elementals, Sticky Flame Range, Summon Water Elementals, and Blink.
